title: [Psx] [Ntsc-J] CRW: Counter Revolution War
description:
CRW: Counter Revolution War for Psx 
(Original Japan Import [SLPS-00220])          Rel: 08/30/96      By Acclaim Japan   

 
Media Format:  CD-R [Ntsc-Japan]
Language:      Japanese
Discs:         1
Image:         CloneCD Image Type, CCD/IMG/SUB 

Requirements:  Modded Playstation or Ps2, Retail Breaker Pro Boot-cd, 
               Game Enchancer/built in mod-chip (allows booting of backups), 
               or Psx Emulator. (You only need one of these methods).

Game Type:     Strategy > Breeding/Constructing. 
               A hybrid realtime/turnbased strategy game.

Game Pics Included.

Game Image Was tested and works normal.

Compressed with Winrar.

Awesome game I think (even though its in japanese still..), This is a straight rip from the original retail game disc which I bought myself.  Hope everyone enjoys it!

Only downside is if you don't understand Japanese well good luck..I couldn't find any walkthru's for it, no english tranlation patch's are out for this game yet, don't know if there ever will be but I hope.

Game Description:

Its the year 2037 the ministry of defence created special duty 4 also known as secret elite unit who operates independantly to destroy insurgents, terrorists, or any other threat, and they only answer directly to the president. They use the best state of the art equipment.


Recommended to burn with Alcohol 120% (Included in Download) Set datatype to Playstation When burning Image To CD-R if possible.

Best Recommended CD-R Media to burn Ps1 games on are Taiyo Yuden, Verbatim Datalife Plus, TDK Reflex, HP CD-R discs are good to.
(Verbatim or standard TDk should work). 

Ur Best bet is probably Verbatim discs for psx backups or even ps2 backups. They will almost always work if you burn it right with Alcohol 120% or Dvd Decrypter for ps2 dvd games. (This is also assuming your consoles are modded or have another method of loading backups correctly).
